headline.main: Newspaper Overwhelmed by Demand for Cavs' Victory Reprints
headline.print_headline: Newspaper Overwhelmed by Demand for Cavs' Victory Reprints

docs.snippet: Overwhelming demand for a piece of history has prompted The Plain Dealer newspaper to print nearly 500,000 copies of its Monday edition proclaiming the Cleveland Cavaliers NBA champions....
docs.lead_paragraph: Overwhelming demand for a piece of history has prompted The Plain Dealer newspaper to print nearly 500,000 copies of its Monday edition proclaiming the Cleveland Cavaliers NBA champions.

headline.main: Exuberant German, Northern Irish Fans March in Paris Ahead of Euro 2016
headline.print_headline: Exuberant German, Northern Irish Fans March in Paris Ahead of Euro 2016

docs.snippet: PARIS - The street of Paris were alive with the sounds of singing and chanting German and Northern Ireland soccer fans as they marched through the French capital ahead of their Euro 2016 match on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: PARIS - The street of Paris were alive with the sounds of singing and chanting German and Northern Ireland soccer fans as they marched through the French capital ahead of their Euro 2016 match on Tuesday.

headline.main: Air France Pilot Unions Cancel Planned 4-Day Strike
headline.print_headline: Air France Pilot Unions Cancel Planned 4-Day Strike

docs.snippet: Air France's pilot unions have cancelled a four-day strike scheduled for later this week after reaching an agreement with the company over working conditions....
docs.lead_paragraph: Air France's pilot unions have cancelled a four-day strike scheduled for later this week after reaching an agreement with the company over working conditions.

headline.main: Merlin and Metrovacesa Agree Merger to Form Spain's Largest Property Group
headline.print_headline: Merlin and Metrovacesa Agree Merger to Form Spain's Largest Property Group

docs.snippet: Property companies Merlin and Metrovacesa have signed an agreement to form Spain's largest real estate group by rental assets, according to a company filing with the stock market regulator....
docs.lead_paragraph: Property companies Merlin and Metrovacesa have signed an agreement to form Spain's largest real estate group by rental assets, according to a company filing with the stock market regulator.

headline.main: In a 'One and Done' World, Raisman and Douglas Try Again
headline.print_headline: In a 'One and Done' World, Raisman and Douglas Try Again

docs.snippet: The double standard didn't hit Aly Raisman fully until she found herself talking to New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady. You know, as one does....
docs.lead_paragraph: The double standard didn't hit Aly Raisman fully until she found herself talking to New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady. You know, as one does.

headline.main: Rio Mayor: Olympics Not Behind Brazil Financial Disaster
headline.print_headline: Rio Mayor: Olympics Not Behind Brazil Financial Disaster

docs.snippet: Rio de Janeiro's mayor went on the offensive to protect his reputation and that of his Olympic city on Tuesday, insisting that the upcoming Summer Games are not responsible for Brazil's current economic debacle....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rio de Janeiro's mayor went on the offensive to protect his reputation and that of his Olympic city on Tuesday, insisting that the upcoming Summer Games are not responsible for Brazil's current economic debacle.

headline.main: US Army Facility Cleared, Report of Gunman 'Unfounded'
headline.print_headline: US Army Facility Cleared, Report of Gunman 'Unfounded'

docs.snippet: Authorities lifted a lockdown order at a sprawling U.S. Army Reserve facility in Northern California after not finding anything suspicious Tuesday following reports of a possible gunman....
docs.lead_paragraph: Authorities lifted a lockdown order at a sprawling U.S. Army Reserve facility in Northern California after not finding anything suspicious Tuesday following reports of a possible gunman.

headline.main: Air France Pilots Call Off June 24-27 Strike: Union Officials
headline.print_headline: Air France Pilots Call Off June 24-27 Strike: Union Officials

docs.snippet: The two main Air France pilot unions, SNPL and Spaf, have called off a strike planned for June 24 to June 27, union officials told Reuters on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The two main Air France pilot unions, SNPL and Spaf, have called off a strike planned for June 24 to June 27, union officials told Reuters on Tuesday.

headline.main: Feds Won't File Charges in Killing by Police
headline.print_headline: Feds Won't File Charges in Killing by Police

docs.snippet: Federal prosecutors will not file charges against three police officers in Pasco, Washington, who shot and killed a mentally ill man last year, sparking weeks of protests....
docs.lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors will not file charges against three police officers in Pasco, Washington, who shot and killed a mentally ill man last year, sparking weeks of protests.
